text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Let's have your finished "hall of fame" 
horsegirl partake in some racing action!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
In the "Daily Races" you can earn money
and support points, among a few other
things.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
You can only enter these a few times per
day so make sure to remember them!
color_text_info_list: enter these a few times per day

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Let me introduce you to the "Team
Stadium" as well. Here, horsegirls can
compete in a team format.
